about-subtitle: Frontend developer who cares about results
about-description-p-1: I build modern, fast, and intuitive web interfaces. I work with TypeScript, React, and the modern frontend ecosystem to turn ideas into reliable, thoughtful, and user-friendly applications. My goal is not just to write code, but to create products people enjoy using.
about-description-p-2: I combine an engineering mindset with an eye for detail — writing clean, maintainable code, using type safety, and designing architectures that scale. I constantly learn new tools and approaches to build solutions that are fast, stable, and aesthetically refined.
projects-description: A selection of projects that reflect my experience with modern frontend technologies, design precision, and user-focused thinking. Each one represents a solved challenge — from interface performance to user experience.
project-1-description: Developed a responsive website for the European student organization BEST. Responsible for UI implementation, adaptive layout, and event management features.
project-2-title: Online Whiteboard for BEST Eka UrFU
project-2-description: Built a real-time collaborative whiteboard using Next.js, TypeScript, and Convex. Focused on interaction speed and smooth data synchronization.
project-3-description: Redesigned and improved a personal website based on a new client request. Optimized structure, visuals, and user flow for better engagement.
contact-description: I’m always open to new challenges and collaborations. If you’re looking for a developer who takes ownership, pays attention to detail, and turns design into a living product — feel free to reach out.
